attributes.action: Make Into Law That Front Page 'Blunders' Should Mean Front Page Apologies.
attributes.additional_details: Additionally, any misleading or incorrect article should have an equally weighted apologetic article that clearly explains errors. As a minimum would be equal words or more, same number of printed copies put into circulation and the same day of the week.
attributes.background: Due to The Sun's recent misleading '1 in 5 british muslims' sympathise with jihadists' headline and a history of printed media's poor excuse for printed apologies, we would like to see 'Front Page errors with Front Page apologies' of equal font and printed circulation.
